name: Smart Savings Tracker (Feminine)
tagline: Savings challenge with a motivating visual grid.

reviews.author: Buyer
reviews.text: So motivating and actually fun to use!

description_html:
Save with momentum

Track your progress with a clean, gamified savings grid. Designed to keep you motivated and consistent.

What you get

Spreadsheet file + quick start guide.

Compatibility

Google Sheets (best). Excel compatible.

name: TimeTrack Assistant — Time Tracker (Feminine)
tagline: Log your time with clarity — see where your day goes.

reviews.author: Customer
reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to understand my time.

description_html:
Track with zero friction

Fast, friendly time tracking that rolls up into clear daily and weekly views.

What you get

Spreadsheet + setup guide.

name: Annual Budget (Neutral)
description_html: A friendly, powerful yearly budget that feels like an app but remains a spreadsheet you own.

name: Pomodoro — Productivity & Study Timer
description_html:
Focus without distractions

Use the Pomodoro method (25/5) to build sustainable focus habits. Track your study or work sessions easily.

name: Study Session Logger
tagline: Log study sessions with clarity and insight.
description_html:
Track your learning time

Keep consistent records of your study hours. Great for students and lifelong learners who want visibility into their time investment.

name: All-in-One Productivity Dashboard
tagline: Pomodoro + Study Logger with integrated dashboard.
description_html:
Two tools in one

Get both the Pomodoro Timer and Study Session Logger bundled together. Manage your time and focus from one central dashboard.
